Label: Flow
Description: Direction in which trade is measured

Label: Seasonal Adjustment
Description: Whether the time-series has been adjusted to remove cyclical components

Label: Employment
Description: Number of employees in the business

Label: Age of Business
Description: How long the business has been trading

Label: Trade Partner Geography
Description: Location of the trade partner. Typically a foreign geography. The destination of exports or origin of imports.

Label: Trade Reporter Geography
Description: Location of the trade reporter. Typically a domestic geography. The destination of imports or origin of exports.

Label: International Trade Basis
Description: The methodological basis on which the trade statistics have been calculated

Label: Investment Direction
Description: Direction of foreign direct investment into the UK (inward) or abroad (outward)

Label: Export and Import Activity
Description: Whether and how the business is trading internationally

Label: Proportion of all Business
Description: The proportion of all businesses that match the specified criteria

Label: ONS FDI Area
Description: Area from which foreign direct investment (FDI) flows into/out of the UK

Label: FDI Component
Description: Foreign direct investment (FDI) component being measured

Label: FDI Industry
Description: High level industry groupings based on SIC 2007

Label: NUTS Geography
Description: The Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics (NUTS) is a geocode standard by Eurostat for referencing the subdivisions of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland for statistical purposes.

Label: ONS Functional Category
Description: ONS high level industry groupings based on SIC 2007

Label: SIC Industry
Description: The current Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) used in classifying business establishments and other statistical units by the type of economic activity in which they are engaged.
